channel.title: calibration on RobotFlow
channel.description: Recent content in calibration on RobotFlow

item.title: 手眼标定的福音，Easy HandEye从入门到精通
item.description: A tutorial on using easy-handeye to calibrate robot arm Easy-handeye can calibrate both eye-in-hand and eye-on-base robot arm. Pre-requests The following pre-requests are some bugs that I met when I first ran Easy-handeye. I cannot make sure all dependencies are listed. Most bugs or errors come from the shortage of ros packages, please install them based on error logs. 1. Make sure ROS and Moveit is successfully installed. ROS should be installed in desktop-full version.
